"Xiera": "You're learning fast! Next, <red>set the Technique you just learned onto a weapon palette<c>."

"・Select [Equip Weapons] from the main menu
・Select a slot
・Select the Technique you want to set"

"You can use Techniques that you have learned by setting them to a weapon's palette.

\"TEC Disks\" can drop randomly when defeating enemies or breaking containers."
